page.title: 10CAMPING-BOATING WEST OF BATH
page.content: The Caravan Park, which can be seen from the cycle track, can cater for 57 caravans, with an overflow field for 15 more. Alot of the campers are English but many are foreign visitors coming to see{the beautiful city of {Bath.}The park does not get many visitors between October and March, the low season for camping in Great Britain. The Boating Station is also visible from the cycle track. It is situated almost opposite the caravan park. Most of the large boats are privately owned, but you can hire dinghys and rowing boats. There is a small cafe nearby. There are plans to improve this area. The boating station is going to be extended and a picnic area is going to be provided alongside the exsisting play park.
